title: Eric Weinstein, Ross Douthat, Saving the World not FROM but FOR
description:
Eric had Ross on the Portal and it did not disappoint. This was a substantive, meaty conversation with lots of interesting aspect. Again, the aching gap for Eric is the emphasis on the technical and the avoidance of the religious. Douthat is a terrific conversation partner for him.
